message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value related to the total amount of tax the entity is expected to pay or recover during the reporting period.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see that there is a specific line item called "Tax Expense" with a value of 391297.55. This represents the total amount of tax the entity is expected to pay for the reporting period ending 2024-01-30.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '391297.55'} }
```
